User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account in the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

lastLogin.description: Timestamp indicating the last time the user logged in.

isAdmin.description: Indicates if the user has administrative privileges.

GeminiApiKey.title: GeminiApiKey
GeminiApiKey.description: Stores the Gemini API key associated with a user account.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Gemini API Key entry.

name.description: A user-friendly name for the API key.

usage.description: The number of times the key has been used.

lastUsed.description: The last date the key was used.

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default key for the user.

WordPressConnection.title: WordPressConnection
WordPressConnection.description: Stores WordPress connection details for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the WordPress Connection entry.

url.description: The URL of the WordPress site.

appPassword.description: Application password for the WordPress site (encrypted).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. An admin can read all user profiles, while a regular user can only read/write their own.

/users/{userId}/geminiApiKeys/{geminiApi.description: Stores Gemini API keys associated with a user. Only the user can manage their own keys.

/users/{userId}/wordpressConnections/{wo.description: Stores WordPress connection details for a user. Only the user can manage their own connections.
